job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Required Technical Skills:     - Strong SRE experience along with automated build tools, continuous integration and continuous deployment concepts.   
  - Experienced in Agile development lifecycle      
Hands-on experience with the following:     - Programming languages: Python, Shell   
  - Database platforms: DB2/MSSQL   
  - SCM tools: GIT   
  - Continuous integration Tools: Jenkins   
  - Web servers: Tomcat/Apache   
  - Operating systems: Unix      
Good knowledge of:     - Programming languages: Perl, batch   
  - Database platforms: PostgreSQL   
  - Cloud-based environments such as: AWS and Azure   
  - Container platform: Docker   
  - Operating systems: Windows      
Desired Technical Skills:     - Monitoring tools like AppDynamics, Splunk and Prometheus   
  - Build automation tools: Ant, Gradle, Maven      
Required Aptitudes     - Ability to add value by bringing new ideas to the team and taking the initiative in improving the existing processes.   
  - Ability to take new requirements from the application teams to bring back to the core team build additional tools and automation.   
  - Passion for innovating and using technology to find creative solutions to optimize systems.   
  - Eager to learn and be in sync with what is happening in technology, DevOps/SRE, both in and outside the firm.      
Educational qualification and experience:     - Bachelor's degree in engineering/computer science or MCA from recognized institution   
  - Minimum 5 years of relevant experience.   
  - Language requirements: Must be able to work in an English-speaking environment
